english.segment1: It used to be darkness. Without you. I lived my life in blindness. But now I am found
english.segment2: And I'll sing, sing I love you so. And I'll sing. Because the world can't take away. Your love
english.segment3: You found me in weakness. Broken. You came to me in kindness. And now I live
english.segment4: I'll give my life for you Lord. For all you've done
